trans-unit.source: Build an HBase application using Maven | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Build an HBase application using Maven | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Apache Maven to build a Java-based Apache HBase application, then deploy it to Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Apache Maven to build a Java-based Apache HBase application, then deploy it to Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Use Maven to build Java applications that use HBase with HDInsight (Hadoop)
trans-unit.target: Use Maven to build Java applications that use HBase with HDInsight (Hadoop)

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create and build an [Apache HBase](http://hbase.apache.org/) application in Java by using Apache Maven.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create and build an [Apache HBase](http://hbase.apache.org/) application in Java by using Apache Maven.

trans-unit.source: Then use the application with Azure HDInsight (Hadoop).
trans-unit.target: Then use the application with Azure HDInsight (Hadoop).

trans-unit.source: [Maven](http://maven.apache.org/) is a software project management and comprehension tool that allows you to build software, documentation, and reports for Java projects.
trans-unit.target: [Maven](http://maven.apache.org/) is a software project management and comprehension tool that allows you to build software, documentation, and reports for Java projects.

trans-unit.source: In this article, you will learn how to use it to create a basic Java application that that creates, queries, and deletes an HBase table on an Azure HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: In this article, you will learn how to use it to create a basic Java application that that creates, queries, and deletes an HBase table on an Azure HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: Requirements

trans-unit.source: [Java platform JDK](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html) 7 or later
trans-unit.target: [Java platform JDK](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html) 7 or later

trans-unit.source: Maven
trans-unit.target: Maven

trans-unit.source: An Azure HDInsight cluster with HBase
trans-unit.target: An Azure HDInsight cluster with HBase

trans-unit.source: Create the project
trans-unit.target: Create the project

trans-unit.source: From the command-line in your development environment, change directories to the location where you want to create the project, for example, `cd code\hdinsight`.
trans-unit.target: From the command-line in your development environment, change directories to the location where you want to create the project, for example, `cd code\hdinsight`.

trans-unit.source: Use the __mvn__ command, which is installed with Maven, to generate the scaffolding for the project.
trans-unit.target: Use the __mvn__ command, which is installed with Maven, to generate the scaffolding for the project.

trans-unit.source: This creates a new directory in the current directory, with the name specified by the __artifactID__ parameter (**hbaseapp** in this example.) This directory will contain the following items:
trans-unit.target: This creates a new directory in the current directory, with the name specified by the __artifactID__ parameter (**hbaseapp** in this example.) This directory will contain the following items:

trans-unit.source: __pom.xml__: The Project Object Model ([POM](http://maven.apache.org/guides/introduction/introduction-to-the-pom.html)) contains information and configuration details used to build the project.
trans-unit.target: __pom.xml__: The Project Object Model ([POM](http://maven.apache.org/guides/introduction/introduction-to-the-pom.html)) contains information and configuration details used to build the project.

trans-unit.source: __src__: The directory that contains the __main\java\com\microsoft\examples__ directory, where you will author the application.
trans-unit.target: __src__: The directory that contains the __main\java\com\microsoft\examples__ directory, where you will author the application.

trans-unit.source: Delete the __src\test\java\com\microsoft\examples\apptest.java__ file because it will not be used in this example.
trans-unit.target: Delete the __src\test\java\com\microsoft\examples\apptest.java__ file because it will not be used in this example.

trans-unit.source: Update the Project Object Model
trans-unit.target: Update the Project Object Model

trans-unit.source: Edit the __pom.xml__ file and add the following code inside the `<dependencies>` section:
trans-unit.target: Edit the __pom.xml__ file and add the following code inside the `<dependencies>` section:

trans-unit.source: This tells Maven that the project requires __hbase-client__ version __0.98.4-hadoop2__.
trans-unit.target: This tells Maven that the project requires __hbase-client__ version __0.98.4-hadoop2__.

trans-unit.source: At compile time, this will be downloaded from the default Maven repository.
trans-unit.target: At compile time, this will be downloaded from the default Maven repository.

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Maven Central Repository Search](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails%7Corg.apache.hbase%7Chbase-client%7C0.98.4-hadoop2%7Cjar) to learn more about this dependency.
trans-unit.target: You can use the [Maven Central Repository Search](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails%7Corg.apache.hbase%7Chbase-client%7C0.98.4-hadoop2%7Cjar) to learn more about this dependency.

trans-unit.source: Add the following code to the __pom.xml__ file.
trans-unit.target: Add the following code to the __pom.xml__ file.

trans-unit.source: This must be inside the `<project>...</project>` tags in the file, for example, between `</dependencies>` and `</project>`.
trans-unit.target: This must be inside the `<project>...</project>` tags in the file, for example, between `</dependencies>` and `</project>`.

trans-unit.source: This configures a resource (__conf\hbase-site.xml__,) that contains configuration information for HBase.
trans-unit.target: This configures a resource (__conf\hbase-site.xml__,) that contains configuration information for HBase.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can also set configuration values via code.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can also set configuration values via code.

trans-unit.source: See the comments in the __CreateTable__ example that follows for how to do this.
trans-unit.target: See the comments in the __CreateTable__ example that follows for how to do this.

trans-unit.source: This also configures the [Maven Compiler Plugin](http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-compiler-plugin/) and [Maven Shade Plugin](http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-shade-plugin/).
trans-unit.target: This also configures the [Maven Compiler Plugin](http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-compiler-plugin/) and [Maven Shade Plugin](http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-shade-plugin/).

trans-unit.source: The compiler plug-in is used to compile the topology.
trans-unit.target: The compiler plug-in is used to compile the topology.

trans-unit.source: The shade plug-in is used to prevent license duplication in the JAR package that is built by Maven.
trans-unit.target: The shade plug-in is used to prevent license duplication in the JAR package that is built by Maven.

trans-unit.source: The reason this is used is that the duplicate license files cause an error at run time on the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The reason this is used is that the duplicate license files cause an error at run time on the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Using maven-shade-plugin with the `ApacheLicenseResourceTransformer` implementation prevents this error.
trans-unit.target: Using maven-shade-plugin with the `ApacheLicenseResourceTransformer` implementation prevents this error.

trans-unit.source: The maven-shade-plugin also produces an uber jar (or fat jar,) that contains all the dependencies required by the application.
trans-unit.target: The maven-shade-plugin also produces an uber jar (or fat jar,) that contains all the dependencies required by the application.

trans-unit.source: Save the __pom.xml__ file.
trans-unit.target: Save the __pom.xml__ file.

trans-unit.source: Create a new directory named __conf__ in the __hbaseapp__ directory.
trans-unit.target: Create a new directory named __conf__ in the __hbaseapp__ directory.

trans-unit.source: In the __conf__ directory, create a new file named __hbase-site.xml__ and use the following as the contents:
trans-unit.target: In the __conf__ directory, create a new file named __hbase-site.xml__ and use the following as the contents:

trans-unit.source: This file will be used to load the HBase configuration for an HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This file will be used to load the HBase configuration for an HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] This is a very minimal hbase-site.xml file, and it contains the bare minimum settings for the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] This is a very minimal hbase-site.xml file, and it contains the bare minimum settings for the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: For a full version of the hbase-site.xml configuration file used by HDInsight, see [Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using the Azure portal](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#rdp).
trans-unit.target: For a full version of the hbase-site.xml configuration file used by HDInsight, see [Manage Hadoop clusters in HDInsight by using the Azure portal](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#rdp).

trans-unit.source: The hbase-site.xml file is located in the C:\apps\dist\hbase-<version number>-hadoop2\conf directory.
trans-unit.target: The hbase-site.xml file is located in the C:\apps\dist\hbase-<version number>-hadoop2\conf directory.

trans-unit.source: The version number portion of the file path will change as HBase is updated on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: The version number portion of the file path will change as HBase is updated on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Save the __hbase-site.xml__ file.
trans-unit.target: Save the __hbase-site.xml__ file.

trans-unit.source: Create the application
trans-unit.target: Create the application

trans-unit.source: Go to the __hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples__ directory and rename the app.java file to __CreateTable.java__.
trans-unit.target: Go to the __hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples__ directory and rename the app.java file to __CreateTable.java__.

trans-unit.source: Open the __CreateTable.java__ file and replace the existing contents with the following:
trans-unit.target: Open the __CreateTable.java__ file and replace the existing contents with the following:

trans-unit.source: This is the __CreateTable__ class, which will create a table named __people__ and populate it with some predefined users.
trans-unit.target: This is the __CreateTable__ class, which will create a table named __people__ and populate it with some predefined users.

trans-unit.source: Save the __CreateTable.java__ file.
trans-unit.target: Save the __CreateTable.java__ file.

trans-unit.source: In the __hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples__ directory, create a new file named __SearchByEmail.java__.
trans-unit.target: In the __hbaseapp\src\main\java\com\microsoft\examples__ directory, create a new file named __SearchByEmail.java__.

trans-unit.source: Use the following as the contents of this file:
trans-unit.target: Use the following as the contents of this file:

trans-unit.source: The __SearchByEmail__ class can be used to query for rows by email address.
trans-unit.target: The __SearchByEmail__ class can be used to query for rows by email address.

trans-unit.source: Because it uses a regular expression filter, you can provide either a string or a regular expression when using the class.
trans-unit.target: Because it uses a regular expression filter, you can provide either a string or a regular expression when using the class.

trans-unit.source: Save the __SearchByEmail.java__ file.
trans-unit.target: Save the __SearchByEmail.java__ file.

trans-unit.source: In the __hbaseapp\src\main\hava\com\microsoft\examples__ directory, create a new file named __DeleteTable.java__.
trans-unit.target: In the __hbaseapp\src\main\hava\com\microsoft\examples__ directory, create a new file named __DeleteTable.java__.

trans-unit.source: Use the following as the contents of this file:
trans-unit.target: Use the following as the contents of this file:

trans-unit.source: This class is for cleaning up this example by disabling and dropping the table created by the __CreateTable__ class.
trans-unit.target: This class is for cleaning up this example by disabling and dropping the table created by the __CreateTable__ class.

trans-unit.source: Save the __DeleteTable.java__ file.
trans-unit.target: Save the __DeleteTable.java__ file.

trans-unit.source: Build and package the application
trans-unit.target: Build and package the application

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and change directories to the __hbaseapp__ directory.
trans-unit.target: Open a command prompt and change directories to the __hbaseapp__ directory.

trans-unit.source: Use the following command to build a JAR file that contains the application:
trans-unit.target: Use the following command to build a JAR file that contains the application:

trans-unit.source: This cleans any previous build artifacts, downloads any dependencies that have not already been installed, then builds and packages the application.
trans-unit.target: This cleans any previous build artifacts, downloads any dependencies that have not already been installed, then builds and packages the application.

trans-unit.source: When the command completes, the __hbaseapp\target__ directory will contain a file named __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__.
trans-unit.target: When the command completes, the __hbaseapp\target__ directory will contain a file named __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__ file is an uber jar (sometimes called a fat jar,) which contains all the dependencies required to run the application.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__ file is an uber jar (sometimes called a fat jar,) which contains all the dependencies required to run the application.

trans-unit.source: Upload the JAR file and start a job
trans-unit.target: Upload the JAR file and start a job

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] There are many ways to upload a file to your HDInsight cluster, as described in [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] There are many ways to upload a file to your HDInsight cluster, as described in [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).

trans-unit.source: The following steps use [Azure PowerShell](../install-configure-powershell.md).
trans-unit.target: The following steps use [Azure PowerShell](../install-configure-powershell.md).

trans-unit.source: After installing and configuring Azure PowerShell, create a new file named __hbase-runner.psm1__.
trans-unit.target: After installing and configuring Azure PowerShell, create a new file named __hbase-runner.psm1__.

trans-unit.source: Use the following as the contents of this file:
trans-unit.target: Use the following as the contents of this file:

trans-unit.source: This file contains two modules:
trans-unit.target: This file contains two modules:

trans-unit.source: __Add-HDInsightFile__ - used to upload files to HDInsight
trans-unit.target: __Add-HDInsightFile__ - used to upload files to HDInsight

trans-unit.source: __Start-HBaseExample__ - used to run the classes created earlier
trans-unit.target: __Start-HBaseExample__ - used to run the classes created earlier

trans-unit.source: Save the __hbase-runner.psm1__ file.
trans-unit.target: Save the __hbase-runner.psm1__ file.

trans-unit.source: Open a new Azure PowerShell window, change directories to the __hbaseapp__ directory, and then run the following command.
trans-unit.target: Open a new Azure PowerShell window, change directories to the __hbaseapp__ directory, and then run the following command.

trans-unit.source: Change the path to the location of the __hbase-runner.psm1__ file created earlier.
trans-unit.target: Change the path to the location of the __hbase-runner.psm1__ file created earlier.

trans-unit.source: This registers the module for this Azure PowerShell session.
trans-unit.target: This registers the module for this Azure PowerShell session.

trans-unit.source: Use the following command to upload the __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__ to your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Use the following command to upload the __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__ to your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: The command will then upload the __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__ to the __example/jars__ location in the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: The command will then upload the __hbaseapp-1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar__ to the __example/jars__ location in the primary storage for your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: After the files are uploaded, use the following code to create a new table using the __hbaseapp__:
trans-unit.target: After the files are uploaded, use the following code to create a new table using the __hbaseapp__:

trans-unit.source: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This command creates a new table named __people__ in your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This command creates a new table named __people__ in your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This command does not show any output in the console window.
trans-unit.target: This command does not show any output in the console window.

trans-unit.source: To search for entries in the table, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: To search for entries in the table, use the following command:

trans-unit.source: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **SearchByEmail** class to search for any rows where the __contactinformation__ column family and the __email__ column, contains the string __contoso.com__.
trans-unit.target: This command uses the **SearchByEmail** class to search for any rows where the __contactinformation__ column family and the __email__ column, contains the string __contoso.com__.

trans-unit.source: You should receive the following results:
trans-unit.target: You should receive the following results:

trans-unit.source: Using __fabrikam.com__ for the `-emailRegex` value will return the users that have __fabrikam.com__ in the email field.
trans-unit.target: Using __fabrikam.com__ for the `-emailRegex` value will return the users that have __fabrikam.com__ in the email field.

trans-unit.source: Since this search is implemented by using a regular expression-based filter, you can also enter regular expressions, such as __^r__, which will return entries where the email begins with the letter 'r'.
trans-unit.target: Since this search is implemented by using a regular expression-based filter, you can also enter regular expressions, such as __^r__, which will return entries where the email begins with the letter 'r'.

trans-unit.source: Delete the table
trans-unit.target: Delete the table

trans-unit.source: When you are done with the example, use the following command from the Azure PowerShell session to delete the __people__ table used in this example:
trans-unit.target: When you are done with the example, use the following command from the Azure PowerShell session to delete the __people__ table used in this example:

trans-unit.source: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Replace __hdinsightclustername__ with the name of your HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Troubleshooting
trans-unit.target: Troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: No results or unexpected results when using Start-HBaseExample
trans-unit.target: No results or unexpected results when using Start-HBaseExample

trans-unit.source: Use the `-showErr` parameter to view the standard error (STDERR) that is produced while running the job.
trans-unit.target: Use the `-showErr` parameter to view the standard error (STDERR) that is produced while running the job.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
